gurmukhi: isAwm mUrqinn Awid Bix`jY ] sqcr kih piq Sbd Dir`jY ] S`qRu sbd iqh AMq bKwnhu ] sB sRI nwm qupk Anumwnhu ]1035]
transliteration: Siaam Moondatnin Aadh Bhanijjai|| Satchar Kah(i) Pat(i) Shabad Dharijjai|| Shattru Sabad(u) Tih Ant Bakhaanoh|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Anoumaanoh||1035||
translation: Saying the words “Shyam-muratnin” in the beginning, then add the words “Satchar-pati-shatru” and know al the names of Tupak.1035.

gurmukhi: piRQm qpqnI Sbd aucrIAY ] sqcr kih nwiek pd DrIAY ] S`qRu Sbd iqh AMq bKwnhu ] SB sRI nwm qupk ky jwnhu ]1036]
transliteration: Pritham Tapatanishabad Udareeai|| Satchar Kah(i) Naaik Pad Dareeai|| Shattru Shabad Tih Ant Bakhaanoh|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Ke Jaanoh||1036||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Tapatni”, and the words “Satchar-nayak-shatru” nd know the names of Tupak.1036.

gurmukhi: sUrj puqiRkw Awid Bix`jY ] sqcr kih nwiek pd id`jY ] S`qRu Sbd iqh AMq aucwrhu ] sB sRI nwm qupk jIA Dwrhu ]10367]
transliteration: Sooraj Poutrikaa Aadh Bhanijjai|| Satchar Kah(i) Naaik Pad Deejeeai|| Shattru Shabad Tih Ant Oucdaroh|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Jeea Ddaroh||1037||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Surya-utter the words “Satchar-nayak-shatru” and know all the names of Tupak.1037.

gurmukhi: sUrj Awqmjw Awid BxIjY ] sqcr kih piq Sbd DrIjY ] S`qRu Sbd iqh AMq aucwro ] nwm qupk ky skl ibcwro ]1038]
transliteration: Sooraj Aatamjaa Aadh Bhaneejai|| Satchar Kah(i) Pat(i) Shabad Ddareejai|| Shattru Shabad Tih Ant Oucdaro|| Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Bicdaro||1038||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Surya-aatamjaa”, utter the words “Satchar-pati-shatru” nd consider all the names of Tupak.1038.

gurmukhi: Awid mwnnI Sbd aucwro ] sqcr kih piq pd dY fwro ] Air pd qwky AMq aucrIAY ] nwm qupk ky skl ibcrIAY ]1039]
transliteration: Aadh Maananishabad Oucdaro|| Satchar Kah(i) Pat(i) Pad Dai Daro|| Ar(i) Pad Taake Ant Oucdareeai|| Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Bicdareeai||1039||
translation: Saying the word “Maanani” and then the words “Satchar-pati-ari”, know all the names of Tupak.1039.

gurmukhi: AiBmwnnI pdwid Bix`jY ] sqcr kih piq Sbd Dir`jY ] Ar pd qwky AMq bKwnhu ] sB sRI nwm qupk ky mwnhu ]1040]
transliteration: Abhimaananipadaadh Bhanijjai|| Satchar Kah(i) Pat(i) Shabad Dharijjai|| Ar Pad Taake Ant Bakhaanoh|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Ke Maanoh||1040||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Abhimaanini” utter the words “Satchar-pati-ari” and know all the names of Tupak.1040.

gurmukhi: piRQm smXxI Sbd aucwro ] sqcr kih nwiek pd fwro ] S`qRu Sbd ko bhur kih`jY ] nwm qupk ky sB lih il`jY ]1041]
transliteration: Prithamsamyanishabad Oucdaro|| Satchar Kah(i) Naaik Pad Daro|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Kahijjai|| Naam Toupak Ke Sabh Lah(i) Lijjai||1041||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Garvini”, add the words “Satchar-nayak-ari” and consider all the names of Tupak.1041.

gurmukhi: grbix Awid aucwrn kIjY ] sqcr kih nwiek pd dIjY ] Air pd qwky AMq aucwrhu ] nwm qupk ky skl ibcwrhu ]1042]
transliteration: Gadban(i) Aadh Ouchaaran Keejai|| Satchar Kah(i) Naaik Pad Deejai|| Ar(i) Pad Taake Ant Ouchaatoh|| Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Bicdaroh||1042||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Garvini”, add the words “Satchar-nayak-ari” and consider all the names of Tupak.1042.

gurmukhi: dRpnn muK qy Sbd su Awid aucwrIAY ] sqcr kih kr nwQ Sbd dY fwrIAY ] S`qRu Sbd khu qwky AMq bKwnIAY ] ho skl qupk ky nwm sbu`D pihcwnIAY ]1043]
transliteration: Drapanan Moukh Te Sabad Su Aadh Oucdareeai|| Satchar Kah(i) Kar Naath Shabad Dai Dareeai|| Shattru Shabad Kauh Taake Ant Bakhaaneeai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Sabuddh Paihchaaneeai||1043||
translation: Saying the word “Darpanani”, mention the words “Satcharnaath” and “Shatru” at the end, and recognize all the names of Tupak.1043.

gurmukhi: AhMkwrnI Awid aucwro ] sqcr kih piq pd khu fwro ] S`qRu Sbd ko bhur Bix`jY ] nwm qupk ky sB lih il`jY ]1044]
transliteration: Ahankaarniaadh Oucdaro|| Satchar Kah(i) Pat(i) Pad Kauh Daro|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bhaur Bhanijjai|| Naam Toupak Ke Sabh Lah(i) Lijjai||1044||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Ahamkaarini”, utter the words “Satchar-pati-shatru” and know all the names of Tupak.1044.

gurmukhi: pIAxIx Awid aucwrx kIjY ] sqcr kih piq Sbd BxIjY ] irp pd qwky AMq bKwxhu ] sB sRI nwm qupk ky jwxhu ]1045]
transliteration: Peeanin Aadh Ouchaaran Keejai|| Sarchar Paih Pat(i) Shabad Bhaneejai|| Rip Pad Taake Ant Bakhaanoh|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Ke Jaanoh||1045||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Pee-anin”, utter the word “Satchar-pati-ripu” and know the names of Tupak.1045.
